title: Spectator Mode UI Bug: Surrender Button
body:
Hey guys! Pretty low priority bug here, but if you're spectating a friend, there's still a surrender button on the UI! After 20 minutes, you can click it and nothing will happen, but I just thought it was kind of funny.

Repro steps:
1) Log into the game and get to the lobby
2) Right click on anyone in your friend's list and hit "Spectate"
3) While spectating a game, hit the escape button

Results:
Observe that there is a surrender button showing up, despite being a spectator
Observe that it unlocks after 20 minutes, and that a player can click the "Surrender" button

Version:
6.3.16_02_05_12_04

replies.body:
Hey Cymdai! 

Thanks for the report! This is currently WAI. As Nyaboron mentioned, it's the same UI as the game client, and we're cool with this, as long as it's not actually surrendering the game. ^-^
I don't think it's a bug, the spectate client is the same as the game client so they would have to actively take it out instead of disable it. Taking it out is more work, I think.
